title: Ella Highlands Adventure

itinerary.title: Nine Arch Bridge & Little Adam's Peak
itinerary.description: Hike to iconic Nine Arch Bridge and climb Little Adam's Peak for stunning views.

itinerary.title: Ella Rock Trek
itinerary.description: Challenging trek to Ella Rock summit with panoramic mountain vistas.

itinerary.title: Ravana Falls & Tea Factory
itinerary.description: Visit Ravana Falls and tour a working tea factory to learn about Ceylon tea.

description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of Sri Lanka's hill country with scenic hikes, waterfalls, and tea plantations.
